[ti:Takeaway]
[ar:The Chainsmokers/ILLENIUM/Lennon Stella]
[al:Takeaway (feat. Illenium & Lennon Stella)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Takeaway - The Chainsmokers/ILLENIUM/Lennon Stella (列侬·斯特拉)
[00:00.20]Lyrics by：Andrew Taggart/Alex Pall/Nicholas Miller/Fridolin Walcher/Sorana Pacurar/Sam John Gray/Jonas Becker/Timofei Crudu/Christoph Bauss
[00:00.40]Composed by：Andrew Taggart/Alex Pall/Nicholas Miller/Fridolin Walcher/Sorana Pacurar/Sam John Gray/Jonas Becker/Timofei Crudu/Christoph Bauss
[00:00.61]Your heart for takeaway ye ye ye ye ye
[00:05.33]Your heart for takeaway ye ye ye ye ye
[00:10.21]Your heart for takeaway yeahh yeahhh
[00:15.00]Your heart for takeaway ye ye ye ye ye
[00:21.05]Hey hey hey
[00:23.39]Where do you think you're going
[00:25.18]It's so late late late
[00:28.03]What's wrong
[00:29.89]I said I can't stay
[00:32.80]Do I have to give a reason
[00:34.78]It's just me me me
[00:37.16]It's what I want
[00:39.94]So how did we get here
[00:42.46]3 weeks now we been so caught up
[00:45.08]Better if we do this on our own
[00:49.09]Before I love you nanana
[00:51.71]I'm gonna leave you nanana
[00:53.97]Before I'm someone you leave behind
[00:56.41]I'll break your heart so you don't break mine
[00:58.85]Before I love you nanana
[01:01.15]I'm gonna leave you nanana
[01:03.62]Even if I'm not here to stay
[01:06.07]I still want your heart
[01:07.79]Your heart for takeaway ye ye ye ye ye
[01:12.57]Your heart for takeaway ye ye ye ye ye
[01:17.43]Your heart for takeaway yeahh yeahhh
[01:22.35]Your heart for takeaway ye ye ye ye ye
[01:26.83]Your heart for takeaway yeahh yeahhh
[01:41.34]Your heart for takeaway ye ye ye ye ye
[01:49.77]Fate fate fate
[01:52.11]Is that what what came between us
[01:53.93]Or did we do this on our own
[01:59.26]So how did we get here
[02:01.71]I'm asking myself why I'm so caught up
[02:04.17]Better if we do this on our own
[02:08.29]Before I love you nanana
[02:10.78]I'm gonna leave you nanana
[02:13.16]Before I'm someone you leave behind
[02:15.63]I'll break your heart so you don't break mine
[02:17.99]Before I love you nanana
[02:20.33]I'm gonna leave you nanana
[02:22.79]Even if I'm not here to stay
[02:25.25]I still want your heart
[02:26.94]Your heart for takeaway ye ye ye ye ye
[02:31.74]Your heart for takeaway ye ye ye ye ye
[02:36.58]Your heart for takeaway yeahh yeahhh
[02:41.39]Your heart for takeaway ye ye ye ye ye
[02:46.25]Your heart for takeaway yeahh yeahhh
[03:00.62]Your heart for takeaway ye ye ye ye ye
[03:05.92]Before I love you nanana
[03:08.39]I'm gonna leave you nanana
[03:10.75]Before I'm someone you leave behind

data.trans:
[ti:Takeaway]
[ar:The Chainsmokers/ILLENIUM/Lennon Stella]
[al:Takeaway (feat. Illenium & Lennon Stella)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.20]//
[00:00.40]//
[00:00.61]就是要俘获你的心
[00:05.33]就是要俘获你的心
[00:10.21]就是要俘获你的心
[00:15.00]就是要俘获你的心
[00:21.05]//
[00:23.39]你还想去哪
[00:25.18]这么晚了
[00:28.03]怎么了
[00:29.89]我说了我不能留下
[00:32.80]我非得说个理由不可吗
[00:34.78]我就是
[00:37.16]想这么做
[00:39.94]我们到底是怎么走到今天这一步的
[00:42.46]三个星期了 我们一直都这么困扰
[00:45.08]也许我们分开会更好
[00:49.09]爱上你之前
[00:51.71]我要离开你
[00:53.97]被你抛弃之前
[00:56.41]我会伤透你的心 这样我就可以幸免
[00:58.85]爱上你之前
[01:01.15]我要离开你
[01:03.62]就算我不打算留下
[01:06.07]我仍然要俘获你的心
[01:07.79]就是要俘获你的心
[01:12.57]就是要俘获你的心
[01:17.43]就是要俘获你的心
[01:22.35]就是要俘获你的心
[01:26.83]就是要俘获你的心
[01:41.34]就是要俘获你的心
[01:49.77]命运 命运 命运
[01:52.11]我们的一切都是命中注定吗
[01:53.93]还是刻意为之？
[01:59.26]我们到底是怎么走到今天这一步的
[02:01.71]扪心自问 为什么如此困扰
[02:04.17]也许我们分开会更好
[02:08.29]爱上你之前
[02:10.78]我要离开你
[02:13.16]被你抛弃之前
[02:15.63]我会伤透你的心 这样我就可以幸免
[02:17.99]爱上你之前

[02:25.25]我仍然要俘获你的心
